metadata.description: The name of the app insights instance that you wish to create.
The name of the test that is displayed in App Insights availability tests
Ping url used in availability tests

Configuration.WebTest: [concat('<WebTest Name="', parameters('testName'), '"',  ' Id="', guid(parameters('testName')) ,'"    Enabled="True" CssProjectStructure="" CssIteration="" Timeout="0" WorkItemIds="" xmlns="http://microsoft.com/schemas/VisualStudio/TeamTest/2010" Description="" CredentialUserName="" CredentialPassword="" PreAuthenticate="True" Proxy="default" StopOnError="False" RecordedResultFile="" ResultsLocale="">        <Items>        <Request Method="GET" Guid="a5f10126-e4cd-570d-961c-cea43999a200" Version="1.1" Url="', parameters('testUrl') ,'" ThinkTime="0" Timeout="300" ParseDependentRequests="True" FollowRedirects="True" RecordResult="True" Cache="False" ResponseTimeGoal="0" Encoding="utf-8" ExpectedHttpStatusCode="', parameters('webTestSettings')[0].expected ,'" ExpectedResponseUrl="" ReportingName="" IgnoreHttpStatusCode="False" /></Items></WebTest>')]
